titleStmt.title: The willy, witty, neat, and pritty, damsell: vvhich to a souldier often made this answer, I dare not doe no more nor the back of your hand sir, to the tune of, The Oyle of Barly.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
